She's wearing an old shirt with holes and clearly didn't clean up at all. Whether from the shifting of air or gravity itself, you seem to be drawn closer towards her...
132111.title: Heads or Torsos

choices: blown to another part of the head.
1321111.content:
An updraft carries you upwards towards Emma's face. You continue trying to get her attention, shouting, flailing your arms, no reaction. As you gradually approach you are able to make out every minute detail of her skin and it looks like an alien world. Every clogged pore, strand of peach fuzz, and patch of oil. The normally unnoticeable imperfections caused by her poor hygiene being magnified thousands of times, literally.

You are caught up in her breathing, rapidly increasing the speed of your approach before being pushed away by hurricane winds. What's worse is that the gust caries the distinct stench of halitosis. From past experience, you'd describe Emma's bad breath as "strong enough to peel paint." You gag as you continue to float in front of her, hoping you won't have to endure for long. You are...
1321111.title: With a Face Like That

13211111.content:
Your fate would be sealed with Emma's next action. Like the gates of hell themselves, her lips opened and air began to flow inward at an incredible rate. As she yawned, you were treated to a horrifyingly disgusting sight. Two rows of teeth the size of mountain ranges, each stained yellow with plaque and more than a few had chunks of unidentifiable food between them. A colossal tongue the size of a country, coated in lakes of saliva and fields of filth. Behind that you could barely make out Emma's uvula dancing as the wind rips past it. Past that was a dark, gasping void.

In seconds you passed the threshold of her lips. The air was immediately hotter, thicker, and fouler and it only grew worse as you flew in deeper. Gravity itself seemed to shift as you were drawn towards her...
13211111.title: Over the Lips

132112.content: You seem to be falling, not just down but closer to Emma as she herself gets closer. Her hole ridden sweatpants begin to fill your entire field of vision. You enter her atmosphere, that familiar B.O. of hers becomes stronger with every passing moment. You cry out for help as you drift towards her...
132112.title: Tails or Toes?

info.brief_description: You are shrunken to Micron or Micro size & you must survive on women's bodies.
info.description:
You, the main character are mysteriously (or purposefully) shrunken to micron or micro size and must survive to the best of your ability on the bodies of beautiful women who're unaware of your plight. People's bodies have their own gravity and are like planets to you unless a force strong enough launches or knocks you off. You also have to face the dangers of your unaware captors/hosts doing mundane tasks as they go about their lives.

I got the inspiration to start this interactive story called "A Friendly Wager" by The Micro Giant on Giantess.com http://www.giantessworld.net/viewstory.php?sid=6200&textsize=0&chapter=1

Here are the characters I made up.

Catherine

Appearance: A brunette who has big feet & doesn't bother keeping them clean.

Emma
Age: 24
Appearance: A Slob. She doesn't practice good hygiene and doesn't bathe very often.

Additionally, You can create your own character or use women from your favorite animes, fiction, or TV shows if you want.

Rules are as follows:
- Do not kill off the main character too quickly. No "she ate you and you died haha" if you plan on killing them off, at least keep the story going or have plot build-up. Thanks!
- Try to keep the character's size to the point where the women either cannot see them at all or must really squint to see them.
- Males are allowed, but try to keep it centered around women.
- Nothing too crazy like sudden weight gain or breast size increase.
- Animal Interactions are allowed, but no bestiality or animal sex, please. Gross.

I might add or take away rules. I might also make some little changes here and there. Enjoy.
